title: How to Make Fake Water Droplets Using Hot Glue

steps.headline: Cut off any glue thread that forms.
steps.description: There will usually be a small thread running from the hot glue gun's nozzle that peaks over the drop; this part is not needed and will spoil the water droplet look if left. Simply cut it off with a small pair of sharp scissors, such as nail scissors.

steps.headline: Add as many artificial droplets as you want.
steps.description: More than one dew/water droplet can help to increase the authenticity of the craft object's appeal. You'll need to assess that depending on the object you're enhancing.

steps.headline: Done!
steps.description: The water droplets look realistic and beautiful. Best of all, they'll last for a long time.
